segments.text: I can't believe this little boy is climbing on that rickety stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It looks so unstable; I can already see him tipping backward.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He’s reaching for the cookie jar with such determination!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can see the glint of cookies in his eyes, pure temptation driving him forward.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And the girl is just standing there with her hand raised, wanting a cookie as well.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think they have no idea of the danger they’re in.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The chaos of the kitchen seems to amplify their mischief.
segments.speaker: PAR
